snippet.title: DOUBLE DRAGON NEON Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
CGRtrailers, from Classic Game Room®, presents the launch trailer for DOUBLE DRAGON NEON from Wayforward and  Majesco Entertainment. The Double Dragon reaches its 25 year anniversary and it is celebrated with the release of Double Dragon Neon. This anniversary special is now available on PlayStation Network (PSN) and Xbox Live Arcade (XBLA). Enjoy!

Be sure to check out more video game clips, previews and trailers from Classic Game Room's CGRtrailers at http://www.youtube.com/CGRtrailers
